name: Life of Pixel (Canceled)
blurb: The 8-bit retro platform game dedicated to the brilliance of classic gaming machines with authentic pixel art and amazing chip music.

rewards.reward: BINARY: $3 / \u20ac2.5 ==============================\r\nYou receive our thanks for helping make Pixel a reality and your name will be included on the Super Icon website as a backer for the project!

1-BIT:
A Digital Downloadable copy of the game, DRM free on PC or Mac and an exclusive 8-bit wallpaper for your PC, Mac or mobile tablet. 

Your name will be included on the Super Icon website as a backer for the project!

2-BIT:\r\nA Digital Downloadable copy of the game, DRM free on PC or Mac plus a copy of the game on iOS or Android and an exclusive 8-bit wallpaper for your PC, Mac or mobile tablet. Your name will be included on the Super Icon website as a backer for the project!

2-BIT STEREO: $23 / \u20ac17.5 ============================== A Digital Downloadable copy of the game, DRM free on PC or Mac, an exclusive 8-bit wallpaper for your PC, Mac or mobile tablet PLUS a digital download of the game soundtrack (MP3 format)!  Your name will also be included on the Super Icon website as a backer for the project! You also get an in-game 'Kickstarter Backer' credit!

4-BIT FRIEND:\r\nTwo Digital Downloadable copies of the game (one for you, one for a friend/family), DRM free on PC or Mac plus two copies of the game on iOS or Android. You also get two exclusive 8-bit wallpapers for your computer and your name on the Super Icon website as a backer for the project.\r\nYou also get an in-game 'Kickstarter Backer' credit!

8-BIT:\r\nA Digital Downloadable copy of the game, DRM free on PC or Mac plus a copy of the game on iOS or Android. You also get two exclusive 8-bit wallpapers for your computer and your name will appear on the Super Icon website and the in-game "Room of Legends" Credits. You will also receive an exclusive signed postcard of Pixel from the Super Icon team!

8-BIT STEREO:
$61 / €47 ============================= 
Same as the 8-BIT Rewards PLUS a digital download of the game soundtrack (MP3 format)!
You will also receive an exclusive signed postcard of Pixel from the Super Icon team and a Pixel sticker sheet.

TEST-BIT: All '8-BIT STEREO' rewards plus receive early ALPHA & BETA builds of the game on PC, Mac or Linux - feedback your thoughts and ideas to the developers! Your name will also appear under "Tester Contributors".

8-BITOPIA:\r\n$115 / \u20ac88 ============================= \r\nIncludes 'TEST-BIT' Rewards PLUS a signed 12x12 poster of Pixel with a personalized Thank You message from Super Icon AND inclusion within a special "Hall of Fame" game level with YOUR NAME in it for everyone to see!

16-BIT:\r\n$230 / \u20ac177 ============================= \r\nIncludes 'TEST-BIT' Rewards PLUS a Unique game level with your name inside! You will be immortalized forever. You can choose which game machine you would like to include your named level.

NPC PAL:
$384 / €295 ============================= 
You will be immortalized in Pixels! A pixel version of you will be created and added to the game. You will be a non-deadly, friendly character - a true Pixel Pal!
Also includes 'TEST-BIT' rewards.
PIXEL BUDDY: Includes everything so far plus the AWESOME accolade of being named as an Associate Producer on Life of Pixel. Truly a once in a lifetime opportunity !!
